article_title: Christensen: Chris Rey’s underdog Senate campaign
article_text:
Rey came home to help restore his hometown of Spring Lake

The National Guard major is an Iraq, Afghanistan veteran

Has lined up a campaign team for Senate race

article_metadata.title: Christensen: Chris Rey’s underdog Senate campaign | News & Observer

og.description: When Chris Rey decided to return to Spring Lake several years ago, it was to help his hometown get back on its feet.
